dct_title_s: A plan of the city and country about Jerusalem
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Yards".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, roads, places of historical interest.
Decorative cartouche with text: To the right honble. William Lord Talbot Baron of Hensol.
